'''''Minecraft: Official Magazine''''' was a series of ''[[Minecraft]]'' magazines published by [[wikipedia:Egmont Group|Egmont]] in cooperation with [[Mojang Studios]]. Throughout the magazine's run, 14 issues were published starting in July 2017 <ref>{{mcnet|we-made-magazine|We made a magazine!|July 27, 2017|Marsh Davies}}</ref> and ending in 2019. 

Each magazine was packed in a cardboard box containing the magazine itself with two sheets of stickers. The magazine had 60 pages full of news, build inspirations, guides,one comic, and a quiz at the end. Notably, these featured four new characters created by [[Trudi Castle]].<ref>[https://www.minecraft.net/en-us/article/meet-mags-colourful-characters "Meet the Mag’s Colourful Characters"] by Marsh Davies - [[Minecraft.net]], November 8, 2017.</ref>

== Magazines ==
{{Expand section}}

=== Issue 1 ===
{{Infobox book
| image = Official Magazine - A New Adventure.jpg
| date = July 27, 2017
}}
It contains 14 pages of hints and tips. It has challenges, a difficult quiz, tips on how to throw a Minecraft-themed party, stickers, a card battling game, a four-page celebration of builds and skins created by the Minecraft community and others. It also gives tips on how to battle elder guardians.

=== Issue 2 ===
{{Infobox book
| image = Official Magazine - The Magic of Colour.jpg
| date = October 4, 2017
}}
The second issue was released on October 4, 2017. This issue contains builds, stories, news, scoops and a comic from Trudi Castle, featuring Bear, Monty, Scout and Sparks.

=== Issue 3 ===
{{Infobox book
| image = Official Magazine - Minecraft United.jpg
| date = December 7, 2017
}}
The third issue was released on December 7, 2017. It is based on a winter theme. This issue has a guide to fighting skeletons, medieval snow-themed village builds (and a more general guide to how villages work too), and a feature on enchanting, letters, build-tips, challenges and others.
